textarea.name: norecordings_info
textarea.value:
You Haven't Scheduled Any Programs To Be Recorded

To schedule a recording, exit this screen and
Select 'Program Guide' or 'Program Finder'

textarea.name: helptext2
textarea.value: To give greater or lesser priority to a channel in your lineup, select it from the list. To increase the channel's priority, press the right arrow. To decrease its priority, press the left arrow.

textarea.name: clauseslabel
textarea.value: Select a clause from the list.
